dimensions: parts a & b) 10h x 10.2 diameter cm (3 15/16 x 4 in. )
title: Sugar bowl and lid
description: Globular bowl and flattened dome lid with loop handle; recess cut into edge of lid.  Underglaze white ground with decoration of red dots in irregular concentric blue and green circles, band of vertical green lines around center of bowl.
